thread.title: Police investigate life-threatening shooting on Lexington
thread.title_full: Police investigate life-threatening shooting on Lexington

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: Police investigate life-threatening shooting on Lexington
text:
Rochester police are investigating a shooting that happened early Saturday on Lexington Avenue. According to police, the incident happened around 3:50 a.m. near 551 Lexington Avenue. A 24-year-old Rochester man was shot in the upper body.
The man was taken to University of Rochester Medical Center with life-threatening injuries, police said.
MCDERMOT@Gannett.com
